mapper.insert: insert into `diseases` (id, diseasesName, diseases, prevention,status) values (#{id},#{diseasesName},#{diseases},#{prevention},#{status})
mapper.select: select * from `diseases` where id = #{id} and status = 1
mapper.insert: insert into `usercases` (id, casesid, title, patients, symptoms, among, diagnosis, advice, status) values (#{id},#{casesid},#{title},#{patients},#{symptoms},#{among},#{diagnosis},#{advice},#{status})
mapper.select: select * from `usercases` where id = #{id} and status = 1
